member.name: T:System.Numerics.BitOperations
member.summary: Utility methods for intrinsic bit-twiddling operations. The methods use hardware intrinsics when available on the underlying platform, otherwise they use optimized software fallbacks.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.LeadingZeroCount(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Count the number of leading zero bits in a mask. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction LZCNT.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.LeadingZeroCount(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Count the number of leading zero bits in a mask. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction LZCNT.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.Log2(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns the integer (floor) log of the specified value, base 2. Note that by convention, input value 0 returns 0 since Log(0) is undefined.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.Log2(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Returns the integer (floor) log of the specified value, base 2. Note that by convention, input value 0 returns 0 since Log(0) is undefined.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.Log2SoftwareFallback(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns the integer (floor) log of the specified value, base 2. Note that by convention, input value 0 returns 0 since Log(0) is undefined. Does not directly use any hardware intrinsics, nor does it incur branching.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.PopCount(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns the population count (number of bits set) of a mask. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction POPCNT.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.PopCount(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Returns the population count (number of bits set) of a mask. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction POPCNT.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.TrailingZeroCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Count the number of trailing zero bits in an integer value. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction TZCNT.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.TrailingZeroCount(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Count the number of trailing zero bits in an integer value. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction TZCNT.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.TrailingZeroCount(System.Int64)
member.summary: Count the number of trailing zero bits in a mask. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction TZCNT.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.TrailingZeroCount(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Count the number of trailing zero bits in a mask. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction TZCNT.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.RotateLeft(System.UInt32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotates the specified value left by the specified number of bits. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction ROL.
member.param: The number of bits to rotate by. Any value outside the range [0..31] is treated as congruent mod 32.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.RotateLeft(System.UInt64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotates the specified value left by the specified number of bits. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction ROL.
member.param: The number of bits to rotate by. Any value outside the range [0..63] is treated as congruent mod 64.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.RotateRight(System.UInt32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotates the specified value right by the specified number of bits. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction ROR.
member.param: The number of bits to rotate by. Any value outside the range [0..31] is treated as congruent mod 32.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.RotateRight(System.UInt64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotates the specified value right by the specified number of bits. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction ROR.
member.param: The number of bits to rotate by. Any value outside the range [0..63] is treated as congruent mod 64.

member.name: F:System.DecimalEx.DecCalc.ulomidLE
member.summary: The low and mid fields combined in little-endian order

member.summary: Formats the specified value according to the specified format and info.
